name: mass-link-opener
description: Find and open all links on a page that contain a specific phrase

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.clean: rm -rf build dist && mkdir -p build dist
scripts.package: cp manifest.json popup.* content.js build/ && cp -r icons build/ && cd build && zip -r ../dist/mass-link-opener-v$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip .
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && npm run package:win
scripts.clean:win: if exist build rmdir /s /q build && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir build && mkdir dist
scripts.package:win: copy manifest.json build\ && copy popup.* build\ && copy content.js build\ && xcopy icons build\icons\ /s /i && powershell -command "Compress-Archive -Path 'build\*' -DestinationPath 'dist\mass-link-opener-v%npm_package_version%.zip' -Force"
